scripts.build-ts: tsc -t ES5 -out scripts/index-2.js scripts/index.ts && rollup -f iife scripts/index-2.js | babel -o public/js/main-ts-dev.js && uglifyjs public/js/main-ts-dev.js -cmo public/js/main-ts.js && rm scripts/index-2.js
scripts.build-js: rollup -f iife scripts/index.js | babel -o public/js/main-dev.js && uglifyjs public/js/main-dev.js -cmo public/js/main.js
scripts.build-html: jade views/index.jade -o public/ && jade views/index-ts.jade -o public/
